name: Out of the Dark (HinmanLantern)
description: In Out of the Dark you will try to navigate your way, blindfolded, through several rooms to escape captivity.   Moving your character though a 2D space from a top-down perspective, you will have to feel for walls and listen for clues to find each exit.  Each step and each touch will make noise, however, and too much noise will alert your captors to your attempted escape.  Good luck!
